content: 1 working into the ring 1ch 9dc slip_stitch to first slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet 10sts chain chain round 2 1ch 1dc in same place as slip_stitch 2dc in each double_crochet double_crochet us single_crochet double_crochet around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 20sts fasten_off treble_crochet treble_crochet round 3 join b in any double_crochet of previous round 3ch us double_crochet 3dtr in each of next 2 double_crochet 3ch slip_stitch to next double_crochet *slip_stitch to next double_crochet 3ch 3dtr in each of next 2 double_crochet 3ch slip_stitch dtr double treble_crochet to next double_crochet * repeat from * to * 3 more times fasten us treble_crochet off and using a needle work tail end from front to back going through st at base of starting 3ch * repeat instructions between finishing off weave in all ends asterisks the number of times indicated small flower foundation row using a 4ch slip_stitch to first chain to make a ring or make a magic_ring whichever you prefer round 1 working into the ring 1ch 9dc slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off 10sts round 2 join b in any double_crochet of previous round 2ch 1tr in same double_crochet as joining 1 treble_crochet 2ch slip_stitch in next double_crochet *slip_stitch to next double_crochet 2ch 1tr in same double_crochet as slip_stitch 1tr 2ch slip_stitch in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * 3 more times fas- ten off finishing off weave in all ends wild rose by rosemary s rose © 2021 rosie forth rosemary s rose
